1370: Ripperti was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Pietersen at age 30 in 1370.
Had a son with Pietersen, Gherolf, at age 30.
1372: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Yda, at age 32.
1375: Had a son with Pietersen, Brun, at age 35.
1378: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Heile, at age 38.
1379: Had a son with Pietersen, Poppo, at age 39.
1381: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Brundonis, at age 41.
1384: Lost daughter Yda when Yda was 13 years old.
